definitions.definition: Lasting or remaining active throughout the year , for multiple years, or all the time .

subdefinitions.definition: Continuing without cessation or intermission for several years, or for an undetermined or infinite period ; neverending or never failing ; perpetual , unceasing .
examples: His artwork has a perennial beauty.

subdefinitions.definition: Appearing or recurring again and again ; recurrent . ( rare ) Appearing again each year; annual .
examples: Change is a perennial theme in politics.

definitions.definition: Of a plant : active throughout the year , or having a life cycle of more than two growing seasons .

main_definition: Lasting or remaining active throughout the year , for multiple years, or all the time .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) Of a plant : active throughout the year , or having a life cycle of more than two growing seasons .
